DOC.brief_title: Predictors Coronary Artery Calcium Progression Adults With Prior Zero Coronary Artery Calcium Score
DOC.detailed_description: This study non-randomized prospective cohort study define rate index atherosclerotic plaque development adult prior CAC score 0 give prior CAC zero > 5 year previous . Study personnel abstract CAC coronary compute tomography angiography ( CCTA ) result prior 31 December 2010 single , high-volume military medical center . All patient CAC score zero , irrespective whether zero CAC calculate presence CCTA non-calcified plaque , offer inclusion study cohort . Patients contact via telephone offer study participation . Patients sign write informed consent interview abstract current medical history , medication , exercise practice , social history . Cardiovascular risk factor interest hypertension , hyperlipidemia , diabetes mellitus , family history . Patients undergo blood draw ( complete metabolic panel , complete blood count , lipid panel , serum insulin , high-sensitivity C-reactive protein ( CRP ) , hemoglobin A1c , thyroid function test ) screen undergo cardiovascular risk factor use potential risk marker . Additionally , whole blood serum obtain future investigation determine new marker coronary artery disease ( CAD ) progression genetic polymorphism may predict CAD progression . Patients also undergo EndoPat test utilizing EndoPAT 2000® ( digital pulse amplitude tonometry ) ass endothelial dysfunction . Finally , patient undergo repeat coronary artery calcium score base standard laboratory protocol base heart rate body mass index .
